form_details.declaration: By filling and submitting this form, the management of the pharmacy hereby expresses interest to participate in the Kenya Community Pharmacy Model (CPM).
instructions: This form should be filled only when the management for the pharmacy is interested, freely willing and committed to support their pharmacy to fully participate.
This form should be signed by two of the pharmacy directors one of whom must be the current supervising pharmacist.
A duly filled and signed form should be submitted to ……………………………
form_details.submission_note: Submitting this form is not an automatic confirmation that your community retail pharmacy has been selected. All pharmacies that express interest will be subjected to an assessment and the most suitable will be selected.
